metadata.title: Personal Stylist Marysia Kozlova
metadata.description: Style is something that is in each of us, and all we need to do is find it

hero.welcome: Welcome to the journey of your style!

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.first-text: Hello! My name is Marysia and I am your personal stylist.
about-me.second-text: I have been working in the beauty industry for over 10 years, with countless shoots and an incredible number of satisfied clients.
about-me.third-text: As a makeup artist, I have gained extensive experience working with women, which I am very proud of.

quote.title: Style is something that exists within each of us, and all we need to do is find it.
quote.author: Diane von FÃ¼rstenberg

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: I help clients find their unique style and be impeccable in any situation.

Home.question: Let's create the best version of yourself together!

Services.title: Services
Services.description: With a solid background in makeup artistry, I realized that I want to make women even more beautiful, so now I can offer services for any request.

Contacts.title: Contacts
Contacts.first-description: Appearance always influences how you perceive yourself, your confidence, and your courage to express your inner world.
Contacts.second-description: My services will help identify your needs and find the best solution.

form.title: Get a Consultation
form.subtitle: After Sending your request, I will contact you within 2 days

name.min-length: The name must contain more than 2 characters

email.min-length: The email must contain more than 6 characters

placeholders.name: Enter your name *
placeholders.link: Add a link to your social media

Iryna.name: Iryna
Iryna.review: You not only helped me find a comfortable look, but also accurately considered my preferences and body features. Thanks to you, I feel confident and look great. I am very grateful for your professionalism and attention to detail. I will definitely come back again and recommend you to my friends.

Alla.name: Alla
Alla.review: Marusya, I really want to thank you for the fantastic collaboration and help in creating my new style. Your professionalism, attention to detail, and individual approach made the process of selecting a wardrobe incredibly enjoyable for me, as long shopping trips used to stress me out.

Oleksandra.name: Oleksandra
Oleksandra.review: Thank you for the collaboration, Marina. It was an amazing experience. A true professional, you very carefully selected the wardrobe and created a capsule. It was very easy and pleasant.

Valeria.name: Valeria
Valeria.review: My wardrobe used to be almost entirely black or gray, but Marusya brought color into my life) After working with her, I started seeing myself differently. She picked out clothes that feel emotionally pleasing to wear, and in these outfits, I feel like I'm in my second skin. Reaching out to her was one of the best decisions in my life!

Marina.name: Marina
Marina.review: Your advice and recommendations not only helped update my look but also boosted my confidence. Every outfit we picked out perfectly reflects my personality and lifestyle. Thank you so much for the wonderful experience, and I look forward to continuing our collaboration.
